text:
2.Issue of shares out of revaluation reserves or consideration other than cash or through bonus issue
As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Company has not issued any specified securities out of revaluation reserves at any time since incorporation. Further, except as disclosed in "- Equity share capital history of our Company" and "- Preference share capital history of our Company" on pages 98 and 100 respectively, as on date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Company has not issued any specified securities for consideration other than cash or through bonus allotment at any time since incorporation.
3.Issue of equity shares under employee stock option schemes
Except as disclosed in "- Equity share capital history of our Company" on page 98, our Company has not issued any equity shares pursuant to the exercise of RSUs, which have been granted under the RSU Plans. For details regarding the employee stock option schemes of our Company, see "- Employee Stock Option Schemes" on page 112.
4.Issue of shares under Sections 391 to 394 of the Companies Act, 1956 or Sections 230 to 234 of the Companies Act, 2013
Except as disclosed in the section titled "- Notes to the Capital Structure - Share capital history of our Company - Preference share capital history of our Company" and "- Notes to the Capital Structure - Share capital history of our Company - Equity share capital history of our Company" on pages 100 and 98 respectively, our Company has not allotted any Equity Shares or Preference Shares pursuant to any scheme approved under Sections 391 to 394 of the Companies Act, 1956 or Sections 230 to 234 of the Companies Act, 2013.
5.Specified securities issued in the preceding one year below the Offer Price
Except as disclosed above under "- Equity share capital history of our Company" and "- Preference share capital history of our Company" on pages 98 and 100 respectively, our Company has not issued any equity shares or preference shares below the Offer Price in the one year immediately preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
6.History of share capital build-up of Promoters, details of secondary transactions involving our Promoters (including the Promoter Selling Shareholder), Other Selling Shareholders and Promoter Group, Minimum Promoter's Contribution and lock-in requirements
(a) Share capital build-up of our Promoters (including the Promoter Selling Shareholder)
As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Corporate Promoter holds an aggregate of 87,340,796 Equity Shares, constituting 69.46% of the issued, subscribed and paid-up Equity Share capital of our Company. Our Individual Promoter does not hold any Equity Shares. The details regarding our Corporate Promoters' shareholding is set forth below.
Set forth below is the build-up of the equity shareholding of our Corporate Promoter since incorporation of our Company:
